page.title: 18KINGSCLERE SHOPS
page.content: There are several shops in the village, though some have closed recently. Most people do much of their shopping in near-by towns, and the new by-pass may have spoilt some of the passing trade. There are three pubs, all of which now serve meals and light snacks. We have two newsagents, two butchers, one grocery store, a greengrocer, a wine shop and an off-licence, an antique dealer and an art shop, and one shop which sells clothes. There is also a chemist who dispenses prescriptions. An old-established business sells coal, animal foods and gardening supplies. There is a branch of Lloyds Bank which is open every day. The Post Office deals with other money needs. The old fish'n chip shop is now a Chinese takeaway food shop.
